rules_text:
Whenever one or more creatures become the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on [i]Er[/i]-Corress, Oblivion Priest.
{WB}, Remove two +1/+1 counters from [i]Er[/i]-Corress: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 colorless Horror creature token.
{1}{W}{B}, Pay 3 life, Remove four +1/+1 counters from [i]Er[/i]-Corress: Exile target nonland permanent.
